item.description: Connecticut Day! Sat., May 19, 2012 Celebrate the flavors of Connecticut! Enjoy free tastings of Connecticut made specialty foods and beverages, including tasty treats from our Farm Kitchen Bakery. Free Recipes; Trivia Contest; In-store coupons. --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
